profile.profileDescription: Profile created on 09/08/2022 by CollectiveAccess Administrator

label.name_singular: The following content contains images of
label.name_plural: The following content contains images of

label.name_singular: The following content contains references to
label.name_plural: The following content contains references to

label.name_singular: Internet, on a pay per view basis (vucavu.com)
label.name_plural: Internet, on a pay per view basis (vucavu.com)

label.name_singular: Uncompressed MOV or Apple Pro Res 422 (HQ) File
label.name_plural: Uncompressed MOV or Apple Pro Res 422 (HQ) File

label.description: 300 dpi production stills preferred

label.name_singular: Historic Video Library Collection: available for research and personal access
label.name_plural: Historic Video Library Collection: available for research and personal access

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the set.

label.name: Item description
label.description: Narrative description for item in this set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item in the context of this set.

label.name: Presentation type
label.description: Determines how set is rendered when displayed to the public in the Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Is primary item for set?
label.description: The item marked as primary will be used to represent the set as a whole when included in a list of sets.

label.name: Chronology element code
label.description: Element code of date range element to be used when placing set items into chronological order.

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.name: Loan in date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan out date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: Loan renewal application date
label.description: The date to apply for a renewal to the loan.

label.name: Loan conditions
label.description: A statement of the conditions on a loan.

label.name: Loan note
label.description: General information about the loan.

label.name: Loan purpose
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

label.name: Movement method
label.description: The method used in the movement of an object.

label.name: Movement note
label.description: Additional information about the movement of an object or group of objects.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object is to be removed from its current location.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object was actually removed from its current location.

label.name: Reason for move
label.description: The purpose or reason for the movement of the object or group of objects.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for tour. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the tour.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for tour stop. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the stop.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Location of this stop.

label.name: Physical Description (Video)
label.description:
Add Physical Description as formatted below:

VIDEO
1 video (1 hr. 3 min. 4 sec.) : open reel ; 1/2"
1 video (1 hr. 3 min. 4 sec.) : open reel ; 1"
1 video (3 min. 4 sec.) : Umatic ; 3/4"
1 video (3 min. 4 sec.) : Umatic SP ; 3/4"
1 video (3 min. 4 sec.) : VHS ; 1/2"
1 video (3 min. 4 sec.) : Hi-8 ; 8 mm
1 video (3 min. 4 sec.) : Betacam ; 1/2"
1 video (3 min. 4 sec.) : Betacam SP ; 1/2"
1 video (3 min. 4 sec.) : MiniDV ; 1/4"
1 video (3 min. 4 sec.) : digital

If unknown duration, do not include, if approximate duration, use:

1 video (ca. 3 min.) : open reel ; 1/2"

label.name: Audio Tracks
label.description: List the number of audio tracks pertaining to the item in question.

label.name: Film Length
label.description: Include units of measure.

label.name: Running Speed
label.description: In frames per second (fps).

label.name: Status
label.description:
Cataloguers: Use “Editing in progress” for when you would like to return to editing a record. Use “Editing complete” for when editing is complete and needs to be reviewed.

Reviewers: Use “Review in progress” to note when you have reviewed a record.

Administrators: Use “Complete” once the record’s description is complete and finalize publishing the description and linked assets.

label.name: Date
label.description: This field is a functional date field, which means it will format automatically. Only add information which is known and confirmed. For example, if only a year is known, only add the year. If a month and year is known, only add the month and year.

label.name: Historical Description
label.description:
Add historical descriptions from other sources in this field. Sources can include:

Whispered Art History, Front Magazine, third party articles, and Western Front's legacy website

Be sure to include an appropriate citation and page number if applicable.

label.name: Content Description
label.description: Narrative description of the intellectual work / event

label.name: Program Type
label.description: Select Program Type based on Western Front's organizational structure. If multiple types are valid, select multiple. Do not include Program Type for more contemporary events where the program has since dissolved. This field is purely for historical reference only.

label.name: Rights Summary
label.description: Add information about copyrights and property rights associated with the object, whether they are open access or restricted in some way. If dates, times and availability periods are associated with a right, include them. End user permissions, constraints and obligations may also be identified as needed.

label.name: Library Of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object.

label.name: Title Note
label.description:
Do not use this field if a title proper is used. Use this field only if the title was supplied, and format as follows:

Title is based on the creator.

Title is based on the work type and creator.

label.name: Description
label.description: Use to provide a brief syes_noopsis of the document, image, or object. May include an abstract, table of contents, description of style, materials, and /or techniques used, brief delineation of the historical context of the object, and /or a few points concerning the significance of the resource. Use for short transcriptions. Example: Depicts unknown automobile driver stopping at roadside to add water to engine on all-day drive from Chico to Sacramento. Exact location unknown. Verso stamped with 596; manuscript note indicates car owned by “N.E.R.” (NCSU)

label.name: Notes (Archivist Notes and Occurrence Notes)
label.description: Add any additional notes that should not appear publicly.

label.name: Country
label.description: Complete name of country

label.name: Biography
label.description: Narrative biography for entity and source.

label.name: Source Of Description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Group Description
label.description: Narrative description of the group, including its mandate and history as applicable.

label.name: Source Of Description
label.description: Source of entity description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Vital Dates (Individuals)
label.description: A description of the lifespan of the person or the existence of an organization, using ca. and any other expressions of uncertainty or nuance. For Birth and Death date attributes, record years of birth and death, estimated where necessary. For a corporate body, use birthdate and deathdate to record the dates of founding and dissolution.

label.name: Vital Dates (Organizations)
label.description: A description of the lifespan of the person or the existence of an organization, using ca. and any other expressions of uncertainty or nuance. For Birth and Death date attributes, record years of birth and death, estimated where necessary. For a corporate body, use birthdate and deathdate to record the dates of founding and dissolution.

label.name: Administrative/Biographical History
label.description: Record concisely any significant information on the origin, progress, development and work of the organization (or organizations) or on the life and work of the individual (or individuals) responsible for the creation of the unit of description. If additional information is available in a published source, cite the source. For persons or families record information such as full names and titles, dates of birth and death, place of birth, successive places of domicile, activities, occupation or offices, original and any other names, significant accomplishments, and place of death. For corporate bodies record information such as the official name, the dates of existence, enabling legislation, functions, purpose and development of the body, its administrative hierarchy, and earlier, variant or successive names. (ISAD(G) 3.2.2. See also RAD 1.7B)

label.name: Scope and Content
label.description: The sphere or kinds of activities that generated the records; the period of time and geographical area to which they pertain; their internal structure, including documentary forms; and the matters to which the records pertain.

label.name: Custodial History
label.description: Record the successive transfers of ownership, responsibility and /or custody of the unit of description and indicate those actions, such as history of the arrangement, production of contemporary finding aids, re-use of the records for other purposes or software migrations, that have contributed to its present structure and arrangement. Give the dates of these actions, insofar as they can be ascertained. If the archival history is unknown, record that information. (ISAD(G) 3.2.3. See also RAD 1.7C)

label.name: Immediate Source of Acquisition or Transfer
label.description: Record the source from which the unit of description was acquired and the date and /or method of acquisition if any or all of this information is not confidential. If the source is unknown, record that information. (ISAD(G) 3.2.4. See also RAD 1.8B12)

label.name: System of Arrangement
label.description: Specify the internal structure, order and /or the system of classification of the unit of description. Note how these have been treated by the archivist. For electronic records, record or reference information on system design. (ISAD(G) 3.3.4. See also RAD 1.8B13)

label.name: Language
label.description: Record the language(s) and /or script(s) of the materials comprising the unit of description. Note any distinctive alphabets, scripts, symbol systems or abbreviations employed. (ISAD(G) 3.4.3. See also RAD 1.8B14)

label.name: Related Materials
label.description: Associated material (1.8B18), Related groups of records in different fonds (1.8B20), Related groups of records within the same fonds (1.8B20a)

label.name: Accruals
label.description: Indicate if accruals are expected. Where appropriate, give an estimate of their quantity and frequency. (ISAD(G) 3.3.3. See also RAD 1.8B19)

label.name: Finding Aid
label.description: Give information about any finding aids that the repository or records creator may have that provide information relating to the context and contents of the unit of description. If appropriate, upload a copy. (ISAD(G) 3.4.5. See also RAD 1.8B17)

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Checksum
label.description: Checksum, from a service such as MD5sum, BagIt, or CollectiveAccess' checksum utility. Repeat if multiple checksums exist, the object or object representation described outside of CollectiveAccess (for example, if a digital artwork is large enough to be stored across multiple hard drives).

label.name: Accessioned By
label.description: Name of the person responsible for accessioning the materials.

label.name: Accession Date
label.description: Date the materials were accessioned.

label.name: Documentation
label.description: Add a deed of gift, accession inventory, condition report, or other documentation of the accession.

label.name: Distribution Rights
label.description: Select all Video Out distribution rights that apply.

label.name: Limitations Notes
label.description: Include a Limitations Note to specify any limitations to the distribution rights noted above. If "Broadcast Limited Regions" is selected, include a list of any exceptions to broadcast rights that apply.

label.name: Contract Signed By (VIVO)
label.description: Name of the VIVO staff who signed the agreement.

label.name: Distribution Checklist Notes
label.description: Any additional details or administrative notes about files received.

label.name: Details
label.description: Include a caption or note describing the uploaded document.

label.name: Affiliations and Descriptors
label.description: Enter any details that have been disclosed by the individual.

label.name: Legacy ID
label.description: Data from AtoM export used to map and nest child records

settings.setting: Provide either a formal title or a supplied title appropriate to the unit of description. Example: Kate Craig fonds. (ISAD(G) 3.1.2. See also RAD 1.1B)

role.name: Administrators
role.description: Confers actions needed by those administering the system

role.name: Cataloguers
role.description: Confers actions needed by those editing catalogue entries

role.name: Researcher
role.description: -view Occurrence (Event only), Entity (Name, Alternate Name, and Biography only), Collection, and Media Representation (Digital File Name and Caption fields only), Object (Title, Description, Display Date, Language, Content Notice, Web Notice, Rights Summary fields only) -cannot view Research Request (Occurrence) record, Rights screen (Objects, Collections, Occurrences), Contact Info screen (Entities) -cannot edit or delete any record

role.name: User content moderator
role.description: Allows users to moderate user generated tags and comments

group.name: Cataloguers
group.description: Users who can add and edit catalogue entries
